content: TE 60-ATC-AVR Rotary hammer Versatile and powerful SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer for concrete drilling and chiseling, with Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) and Active Torque Control (ATC) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Active Torque Control (ATC) stops the tool body from spinning uncontrollably if the drill bit jams – helping to reduce a common safety hazard Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity High versatility for a wide range of drilling and chiseling applications Detachable supply cord for quick and easy replacement of damaged/broken cords on the jobsite OSHA 1926.1153 Table 1 compliant when used with the TE DRS-Y and TE DRS-D dust removal system and a Hilti vacuum cleaner Applications Medium-duty demolition work Drilling anchor and through-holes in concrete and masonry (recommended diameter range 5/8 - 3-1/8) Coring in masonry and concrete with TE-Y BK core bits up to 4-15/16 diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 17.2 lb. Weight class: 13 lb. Single impact energy: 5.8 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 17.2 lb | Weight class | 13 lb | Single impact energy | 5.8 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 15/32 - 3-15/16 in | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 23/32 - 1-9/16 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 340 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 3300 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Torque Control (ATC), Active Vibration Reduction (AVR), Chiseling, Depth gauge, Power reduction | Triaxial vibration value for hammer drilling into concrete (ah,HD) | 7.2 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-Y, TE DRS-D, TE DRS-BK | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 6.2 m/s² | 2 | Rated input power | 1350 W | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 19.4 x 4.5 x 11.5 mm | A-weighted emission sound power level | 111 dB (A) | 3 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 103 dB (A) | 4 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3564152 - TE 60-ATC/AVR performance package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 60-ATC/AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE 60-ATC/AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-YX 7/8-13 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-YX SM 36 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 2132224 - Corded Rotary Hammer TE 60-ATC/AVR 120 V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 60-ATC/AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE 60-ATC/AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
